Mendaki Gunung Kebanggaan Orang Dayak Lundayah
07 Nov 2019, 17:47 by Syanti Mustika


Sunrise di Yuvei Semaring (Syanti Mustika/detikcom)

Krayan - Di Krayan ada gunung yang berhubungan erat dengan legenda orang Dayak Lundayah. Dari atas gunung itu bisa terlihat Krayan Induk dari ketinggian dan sunrise yang indah.Saat berkunjung ke Krayan dan bertanya ke warga tentang tempat wisata atau tempat cantik menikmati pemandangan, mereka akan menyarankan ke Gunung Yuvei Semaring. Itulah yang dialami detikcom. Setiap warga yang kami temui menyarankan ke sana.Tim Tapal detikcom datang ke Krayan beberapa waktu lalu dan bertemu dengan Helmi Huda Asfikar, camat Krayan Induk . Dia pun bercerita sedikit tentang Gunung Yuvei Semaring."Kita punya Bukit Yuvei Semaring yang erat kaitannya dengan legenda orang Dayak. Ia adalah orang suku Dayak Lundayeh yang selalu dituturkan dalam kisah rakyat secara turun temurun dimana Yuvai Semaring dianggap manusia yang mencapai tingkat kesaktiannya dan menjadi manusia setengah dewa dalam kepercayaan animisme," ujar Helmi.


(Syanti/detikcom)

Bukit Yuvei Semaring lokasinya tidaklah jauh dari bandara Krayan yang juga memiliki nama yang sama, yaitu Bandara Yuvei Semaring. Bukit yang memiiliki ketinggian sekitar 1100 mdpl itu terlihat jelas dari bandara."Dari puncak Yuvei Semaring kita bisa melihat semuanya. Setiap turis yang datang dan masuk ke Krayan selalu kita bawa ke bukit ini. Kalau cuaca bagus, kamu bisa menikmati sunrise saat naik ke puncak subuh hari. Saat sore hari sekitar pukul 5 sore kita juga dapat sunset," tambahnya.detikcom pun mencoba mendaki gunung kebanggaan warga Krayan ini. Kami berangkat subuh-subuh dari penginapan di Long Bawan dengan harapan bisa mendapatkan suasana sunrise.Titik awal untuk naik ke bukit tidaklah jauh dari bandara, mungkin sekitar 10 menit saja berkendara. Di jalur awal kamu akan menaiki anak tangga yang dibuat warga setinggi 300 meter. Setelah itu kamu akan melewati jalanan setapak hingga ke puncak.


Sunrise di Yuvei Semaring (Syanti/detikcom)

Menurut detikcom jalur pendakian di Yuvei Semaring relatif tidak berat-berat amat. Bukan apa-apa, saya yang sebelumnya tidak pernah mendaki gunung pun tetap bisa melakukannya dengan sukses.Untuk sampai ke puncak, saya membutuhkan waktu 30 menitan dengan beberapa kali berhenti untuk istirahat. Sedangkan guide yang menemani saya hanya butuh waktu 15 menit saja karena dia sanggup lari hingga ke puncak. Wow!Angin pagi saat itu cukup dingin, namun tak mengalahkan semangat saya untuk melihat sunrise dari puncak gunung. Dengan nafas tak beraturan, akhirnya saya sampai juga di puncak. Pertandanya di puncak adalah adanya tiang bendera tegak dengan gagah.Belum terlihat apa-apa, hanya hamparan kabut dan awan menutupi seluruh kawasan Krayan dan pegunungan yang mengelilinginya.


(Syanti/detikcom)

Udara begitu segar, saya tak ingin menyia-nyiakan kesempatan bernafas dengan udara ini. Saya hiruplah nafas ini dalam-dalam. Tak lama kemudian, yang ditunggu pun akhirnya muncul, Sang Matahari!Ahh, sangat dramatis pagi ini dapat menyambut Sang Mentari di pedalaman Kalimantan. Muncul dibalik kabut dan gumpalan awan yang semula putih langsung berubah merah dan kuning keemasan. Indah!Perlahan-lahan awan dan kabut mulai menipis. Dari kejauhan tersingkaplah puncak-puncak pegunungan yang melingkari Krayan. Perlahan puncak pepohonan hijau terlihat. Yang tadi semula putih, berubah menjadi hijau.


(Syanti/detikcom)

Dari atas terlihat jejeran rumah yang tersebar di Krayan Induk. Jalan-jalan yang masih kuning karena belum di aspal begitu mentereng berpadu dengan hamparan lahan hijau di bawah sana.Setelah puas memandang dan menikmati keindahan alam dari puncak Yuvei Semaring, saya pun perlahan turun. Pepohonan yang tadi tertutup kabut mulai terlihat dan mengiringi langkah saya turun dan pulang.Simak Video "Perjuangan Igusti Ayunda Putri jadi 'Penembak' di Perbatasan"[Gambas:Video 20detik](sym/krs)

Climb the Lundayah Dayak Pride Mountain
Nov 7 2019, 17:47 by Syanti Mustika


Sunrise at Yuvei Semaring (Syanti Mustika / detikcom)

Krayan - In Krayan there is a mountain that is closely related to the legend of the Lundayah Dayak people. From the top of the mountain, you can see Krayan Main from the height and beautiful sunrise. When visiting Krayan and asking residents about tourist attractions or beautiful places to enjoy the view, they will suggest Mount Yuvei Semaring. That's what was experienced by AFP. Every citizen we met suggested going there. The Tapal Team came to Krayan some time ago and met Helmi Huda Asfikar, the Krayan Induk sub-district head. He also told a little about Mount Yuvei Semaring. "We have Mount Yuvei Semaring which is closely related to the legend of the Dayak people. He is a Lundayeh Dayak tribe who has always been told in folklore from generation to generation where Yuvai Semaring is considered a human who reaches his level of supernatural power and becomes a human being. demigod in the belief in animism, "Helmi said.


(Syanti / detikcom)

Yuvei Semaring Hill is not far from the Krayan airport which also has the same name, Yuvei Semaring Airport. The hill which has a height of about 1100 meters above sea level is clearly visible from the airport. "From the top of Yuvei Semaring we can see everything. Every tourist who comes and enters Krayan is always brought to this hill. If the weather is good, you can enjoy the sunrise when you climb to the top at dawn. When the afternoon around 5 pm we can also sunset, "he added. detikcom also tried to climb the mountain of the pride of the citizens of Krayan. We departed at dawn from the inn in Long Bawan in hopes of getting the atmosphere of the sunrise. The initial point to go up the hill is not far from the airport, maybe about a 10 minute drive. In the initial path you will climb stairs made by residents as high as 300 meters. After that you will pass the path to the summit.


Sunrise at Yuvei Semaring (Syanti / detikcom)

According to detikcom hiking trail in Yuvei Semaring is relatively not very heavy. It's nothing, I who had never climbed a mountain before can still do it successfully. To get to the top, I need 30 minutes with several stops to rest. While the guide who accompanied me only took 15 minutes because he was able to run to the top. Wow! The morning wind was quite cold, but it did not defeat my enthusiasm to see the sunrise from the top of the mountain. With irregular breathing, I finally arrived at the top. The sign at the top is the presence of a flagpole uprightly. Not seen anything, only a fog and clouds cover the entire Krayan region and the mountains that surround it.


(Syanti / detikcom)

The air is so fresh, I don't want to waste my chance to breathe with this air. I breathe this deep breath. Not long after, the one who was waiting for finally appeared, Sang Matahari! Ahh, it was very dramatic this morning to welcome the Mentari in the interior of Borneo. Appeared behind the mist and wadding clouds that were originally white immediately turned red and golden yellow. Beautiful! Gradually the clouds and mist began to thin. From a distance, the peaks of the mountains around Krayan were revealed. Slowly the tops of the green trees are visible. What was originally white, turns green.


(Syanti / detikcom)

From above you can see a row of houses spread across Krayan Main. The roads are still yellow because it has not been tarmaced so classy combined with the expanse of green land below there. After being satisfied looking and enjoying the natural beauty of the peak of Yuvei Semaring, I slowly descended. Trees that had been covered in fog began to appear and accompany my steps down and back.
